divs: Sighting DetailsAt 9:20 pm Colombian time, I'm in my apartment when I get to go to the balcony & obcervo a rare item I was not a plane at that nose Helicopters for a move or so it was very high. The object was moving from side to side had a yellow and red. Hard to 2 min and at any moment the object in a circle desaparese without explanation. The first reaction I had was a star, so he was still for a few seconds. but after that began to titiliar colors like yellow and blue moving from side to side, obviously not of this planet sec then disappeared. I have seen videos of ufos and stuff like that because as I intereza the subject but what I saw today was not anything I've seen on TV and programs. I've never seen something so rare, but then my mother also was present estava impacted. It was a plane at that nose not move a elicptero by altitude.
Summary: sphere-shaped, circle exactly flash different colors yellow and blue. to horizontal moviemiento
